pullRequest.title: change addHotStateRoot to accept a map
pullRequest.bodyText:
add forkChoice to data backed integration tests

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris paul.harris@consensys.net
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.

commit.message:
change addHotStateRoot to accept a map

 - add forkChoice to data backed integration tests

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

nodes.bodyText: Isn't this covered by the assignment in the field declaration?

Can just use a forEach directly on the map:

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap
          
          
            
                      .keySet()
          
          
            
                      .forEach(
          
          
            
                          stateRoot ->
          
          
            
                              transaction.put(
          
          
            
                                  V3Schema.STATE_ROOT_TO_SLOT_AND_BLOCK_ROOT,
          
          
            
                                  stateRoot,
          
          
            
                                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap.get(stateRoot)));
          
          
            
                  stateRootToSlotAndBlockRootMap
          
          
            
                      .forEach(
          
          
            
                          (stateRoot, blockRoot) ->
          
          
            
                              transaction.put(
          
          
            
                                  V3Schema.STATE_ROOT_TO_SLOT_AND_BLOCK_ROOT,
          
          
            
                                  stateRoot,
          
          
            
                                  blockRoot));

commit.message:
fix Integration Tests.
